Every time you think a thought, you are leaving a morphogenetic imprint within the frequency bands in which your consciousness was sta- tioned. You will run into that thought pattern, in combination with others from the collective consciousness, as a manifestation in physical reality. Mor- phogenetic fields are the form-holding patterns through which matter forms and events manifest. When a morphogenetic field is created, it begins to draw frequency patterns into itself, expanding, accreting, and “fleshing itself out into matter”. Have you ever considered where thoughts go once your atten- tion has left them?
